G

game - package game
 
Game - Class in game
Class for maintaining the game logic.
Game(Player, Player, Board) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new Game with two Players.
Game(Player, Player, Player, Board, Color) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new Game with three Players.
Game(Player, Player, Player, Player, Board) - Constructor for class game.Game
Constructs a new Game with four Players.
GAME_OVER - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] The keyword indicating that the game is finished.
GAME_STARTED - Static variable in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] The keyword indicating a new game was started.
gameOver() - Method in class game.Game
Checks if a Game is done by checking if there are any moves left to be made.
gameOver(String) - Method in class server.Client
Reads if there was a winner and if so who, then prints it to the console.
gameOverDraw() - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] Indicate that the game is finished and it's a draw.
gameOverWinner(String) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] Indicate that the game is finished and that there's a winner.
gameStarted(Map<String, List<String>>) - Static method in class extra.Protocol
[SERVER] Indicate that a game has started, supplying the players of the game and with which colors they play.
gameStarted(String) - Method in class server.Client
Constructs a local game using the server-given arguments.

[EXT LEADERBOARD][CLIENT] The keyword indicating a request for the leaderboard.
